metadata.name: Go Hard or Go Home! 1/1000
metadata.description:
Short Bio

Ghettometal is a unique and innovative band that combines the raw power of heavy metal with the smooth flow of hip hop. This fresh new sound has been attracting a growing fanbase, and the band is poised to make a big impact in the music world.

Be at the front of the line and get your very own limited edition NFT that features 3x time platinum selling artist The Game, platinum hook master Butch Cassidy, Hollywood Sunset Strip veteran Scoonie Gee and up and coming poetess Mizz Kitty. Own a piece of history as the Ghettometal band, music and brand grows globally. Ghettometal is on a mission to bring people together through the power of music and their live show gatherings.
